column4:
['Haye re dekh ke meri jawani', '
Budhe ke muh mein aa gaya pani', '
Kahta aaja meri rani', '
Buddha ye buddha', '
Ye buddha peechhe pad gaya', '
Ye buddha peechhe pad gaya', '
Ri tere gal ke upar til', '
Kahta hai de budhe ko dil', '
Ke tujhko jaye khajana mil', '
Main tera ri tera hoke rah gaya', '
Main tera hoke rah gaya', '
Ye buddha peechhe pad gaya', '
Ye buddha peechhe pad gaya', 'Mai solha ki tu pensath ka', '
Dubke mar besharma', '
Mai solha ki tu pensath ka', '
Dubke mar besharma', '
Bap to mera shankar dada', '
Hey shankar dada', '
Bap to mera shankar dada', '
Beer mera hai dharma', '
Budhe kyu bap ko bulata hai', '
Teri pasli denge sekh', '
Are tu apni umar to dekh', '
Tere sath na milte lekh', '
Hath rah me mar gaya', '
Tere gal ke upar til', '
Kahta hai de budhe ko dil', '
Ke tujhko jaye khajana mil', '
Main tera ri tera hoke rah gaya', '
Main tera hoke rah gaya', '
Ye budha pichhe pad gaya', '
Ye budha pichhe pad gaya', '
Re budha re budha', '
Re budha pichhe pad gaya', '
Bas tera ho ke rah gaya', 'Ankhiyo se main ankhiya mila ke', '
Le jau takhat hajare', '
Ankhiyo se main ankhiya mila ke', '
Le jau takhat hajare', '
Rat ko chadta suraj dekhe', '
Ri suraj dekhe', '
Rat ko chadta suraj dekhe', '
Din me dikhau tare', '
Le aa shankar dada aur dharma', '
Ri o tere do uchke', '
Dono ko dunga aise dhakke', '
Unke main chhuda du chhake', '
Jo meri rah me aa gaya', '
Main tera ri tera ho ke rah gaya', '
Buddha peechhe pad gaya', 'Rog nahi ye tere bas ka', '
Pyar mera anmol', '
Rog nahi ye tere bas ka', '
Pyar mera anmol', '
Jaan bech ke le lu tujhko', '
Ari le lu tujhko', '
Jaan bech ke le lu tujhko', '
Pyar ki boli bol', '
Ri sunke dil ki khidki khol', '
Aisi chal na chal bekar', '
Jinka jisse bhi tha pyar', '
Aakhir mil jayenge yaar', '
Tu khali rah gaya o budha', '
O buddha peechhe pad gaya', '
Re buddha peechhe pad gaya', 'Ri tere gal ke upar til', '
Kahta hai de budhe ko dil', '
Ke tujhko jaye khajana mil', '
Main tera ri tera ho tera', '
Hoke rah gaya', '
Main tera hoke rah gaya', '
Ye budha pichhe pad gaya', '
Tera dil bhukha rah gaya', '
Tera dil sukha rah gaya', '
Budha akela rah gaya', '
Mera to kuchh na rah gaya.']
